addr: 333 South Figueroa Street Los Angeles, CA 90071
title: GLAAACC Annual Peace and Prosperity Toy and Toiletry Mixer
desc: GLAAACC is having its annual Peace and Prosperity Toy and Toiletry Mixer. GLAAACC and PCF are collecting donations for the Union Rescue Mission and the Parents of Watts. The event will be held at The LA Hotel Downtown on December 9, 2015 at 5:30pm. Please bring one unwrapped gift valued at $20 for admission. RSVPs are needed by Monday December 7th at 12pm.
